pygeotoolbox.sharedtools.fonts.svg.base.addCharaters(chars, charsToBeAdded)[source]¶

Adds characters from charsToBeAdded param into chars param, if they are not there already. Result is sorted unicode string out.

Parameters:
  • chars (Unicode) –
  • charsToBeAdded (Unicode) –
Returns:

Unicode sorted union of chars and charsToBeAdded parameters.

 
>>> addCharaters('A', 'CDEF')
u'ACDEF'

pygeotoolbox.sharedtools.fonts.svg.base.getLongerASCII()[source]¶

Returns lower 255 characters from ASCII code table, starting from space (no control characters like CR, LF etc).

Returns:String Returns lower 127 characters from ASCII code table, starting from space (no control characters like CR, LF etc). 
>>> getLowerASCII()
u' !"#$%&'()*+,-./0123456789:;<=>?@ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ[\]^_`abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz{|}~'
